sentences.en: a genetic predisposition to liver disease
Bind the mixture with the raw minced liver and cook for 3 minutes more.
sentences.cn: 让混合物滚上切碎的生肝脏，烹饪3分钟以上。

sentences.en: Contraindications for this drug include liver or kidney impairment.
sentences.cn: 这种药物的禁忌证包括肝脏或肾脏损伤。

sentences.en: Excessive dosage of this drug can result in injury to the liver.
sentences.cn: 这种药使用过量会损害肝脏.

sentences.en: Exploratory surgery revealed her liver cancer.
sentences.cn: 探查性的外科手术查出她患了肝癌。

sentences.en: Liver and kidney are particularly rich in vitamin A.
sentences.cn: 肝脏和肾脏富含维生素A。

sentences.en: Liver cancer is linked to the hepatitis B virus.
sentences.cn: 肝癌与乙肝病毒存在关联。

sentences.en: She was on a wait list for a liver transplant.
sentences.cn: 她的名字当时在肝移植等候者名单上。

sentences.en: The safety of tacrine has not yet been proven, and there is concern that it causes damage to the liver.
sentences.cn: 他克林的安全性尚未得到证实，有人担心它会对肝脏造成损害。

sentences.en: the secretion of bile by the liver
These compounds bind with genetic material in the liver.
sentences.cn: 这些化合物在肝脏中与遗传物质实现结合。

sentences.en: This is a delicious dish — liver and onions.
sentences.cn: 这是一道好菜,洋葱炒肝.

sentences.en: Three weeks ago, it was discovered the cancer had spread to his liver.
sentences.cn: 三周前，发现癌已扩散到了他的肝脏。

sentences.en: We don't serve liver often because so many people dislike it.
sentences.cn: 我们不常做肝这道菜，因为很多人吃不惯。

sentences.en: With this disease the veins in the liver can block up, and all sorts of damage follows.
sentences.cn: 这种病会堵塞肝脏中的静脉，并引发多种损伤。

words.tran_cn: 适于居住的；生活过得有价值的
活的；生动的；实况转播的；精力充沛的
活泼的；生动的；真实的；生气勃勃的
肝病的；坏脾气的；似肝的；易怒的
活的；现存的；活跃的；逼真的

phrases.tran_cn: 肝硬化；肝硬变；慢性间质性肝炎
肝功能试验，肝机能检验；肝功能检查；肝功能测试

trans.tran_cn: 肝脏，（食用）肝，深赤褐色，生活者
trans.tran_en: a large organ in your body that produces bile and cleans your blood
